Job Description: Your responsibilities will include        Design and implement supporting frontend for backend services in mostly ReactJS.      Solve problems that span multiple layers of the application.      Closely collaborate with the engineering team.      Automate all the things related to the frontend. Eg: deployment, testing, or maintenance scripts.      Research web technology trends.      Write Unit, Integration, and User Acceptance Tests.      Help the team grow professionally.      Solve technical problems of moderate scope and complexity.
